item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 5th April
item.description:
3 months with road closure needed please cut back overgrown hedge an vegetation an bramble back to boundary on both sides of road appropriately 300 metres x2500 metres high on left hand side and appropriately 150 metres around bend (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large dead trees and bank is slipping, 5th April
item.description:
I live at 4 Kings Court, Norton, and some of the trees outside my property on the roadside have died, 3 beside each other and have been dead for a few years. They are looking like they may fall at any time and the bank is starting to slip. I know this because my garden the other side of the bank is starting to visibly sink now, despite us reporting to you before. I fear that the tree/s will fall in the high winds and hit a passerby or a car and also then part of my garden will go with it. The hedgerow is very overgrown too.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Road, Norton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: How is this considered not urgent?, 5th April
item.description:
I cannot safely cycle out and in of this junction its so bad, I know its been reported before but you marked it as safe. This is in no way safe, the whole area where I need to cycle through means I need to swerve around it. Its only going to get worse. Please fix it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49, Loweswater Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Multiple large potholes from Cromwell Road to Prestbury Road making it dangerous for cyclist and causing vehicles to swerve in the road to avoid them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chiltern Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.title: Traffic lights, 5th April
item.description:
Junction of hucclecote rd and carisbrooke rd Severn Trent lights not working Reported to Gloucestershire highways at 13.10pm on Friday 5th April Phoned back at 14.41pm lights still not working Spoke to Brett and apparently Severn Trent engineer is on the way These lights have not been working all day
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carisbrooke Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: The traffic light has been vandalised

item.title: As a cyclist I received verbal abuse from multiple car drivers after I was forced off the cycle lane by the roadworks at the hare & hounds junction., 5th April
item.description:
Please have temporary signage imploring car drivers not to take out their frustration on cyclists who currently have to rejoin the road at the B4063 hare and hounds junction at the roadworks on the cycle way. The level of abuse I received as a cyclist was extreme. I can only assume it was due to anger caused by long delays to cars at the 'temporary' road works
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
